english: Playing online games is not a waste of time. In fact, some challenging games can improve your problem-solving skills.
chinese: 玩線上遊戲並不浪費時間。 事實上，有些具有挑戰性的遊戲可以增進你解決問題的技能。

english: High school students should be equipped with the ability to think independently and analyze data.
chinese: 高中生應該具備有獨立思考和分析資料的能力

english: Though some scenes are very bloody, I feel relieved when a murder case is solved.
chinese: 雖然有些場景很血腥，但是謀殺案被偵破時，我感到鬆了一口氣。

english: Of all the TV channels, I like to watch National Geographic Channel the most.
chinese: 在所有個電視頻道中，我最喜歡收看國家地理頻道。

english: Playing table tennis not only improves hand-eye coordination but also keeps your brain sharp.
chinese: 打桌球不僅增進手眼協調，還能讓你保持腦袋靈敏。

english: Their educational and informative programs attract people of all ages.
chinese: 它們充滿教育性質與充滿知識性的節目吸引各年齡層的人。

english: One of the reasons why I like this romantic movie is that it is based on a real-life story.
chinese: 我最喜歡這部浪漫愛情片的原因之一是它以真實故事為根據。

english: The exercise not only eases my back pain but also gives me peace of mind.
chinese: 這運動不僅緩和我的背痛還讓我心情平靜。

english: I go to gym three times a week so that I can stay both my physically and mentally healthy.
chinese: 我每周上健身房三次，如此一來我能保持身心健康。

english: Now he gradually finds that biking enable him to reduce anxious and fell energetic.
chinese: 現在他逐漸發現騎腳踏車讓他減輕焦慮並且充滿活力。

english: I've signed up for group fitness classes so that I can movitage myself to exercise on a regular basis.
chinese: 我報名參加了團體課程，這樣我才能激勵自己規律運動。

english: Jogging regularly boost your blood circulation, thus decline your case of heart disease and strokes.
chinese: 規律的慢跑增強血液循環，因此降低你心臟病和中風的風險。

english: Though I can't play any musical instrument, I still enjoy appreciate all kinds of music and dance to the music once in a while.
chinese: 雖然我不會彈奏任何樂器，但是我仍舊欣賞各種音樂，並偶爾隨著音樂起舞。

english: Speaking of my favorite singer, the name "Rick Astley" immediately comes into my mind.
chinese: 說到我最喜愛的歌手，Rick Astley 這個名字立刻出現在我的腦海。

english: Sean was so absored in music that he forgot to eat lunch.
chinese: Sean 太全神貫注於音樂了，以至於忘了吃午餐。

english: After school, Yvonne likes to turn on the radio and immerse herself in soft music.
chinese: 放學後，Yvonne 喜歡打開收音機，然後沉靜於音樂之中。

english: The reason for the popularity at her song is that tunes are catchy.
chinese: 他的歌曲這麼受歡迎的原因是因為旋律易聽好記。

english: Through reading, you can travel to any time period in history or any place in the world; that's why reading is my favorite pastime.
chinese: 透過閱讀，你可以遊覽到史上任何時期或世上任何地方；這就是為什麼閱讀是我最喜歡的休閒娛樂。

english: The athlete's biography was so encouraging that it became a best-seller overnight.
chinese: 這運動員的傳記是如此鼓勵人心，一夜之間成了暢銷書。

english: The more widely you read, the more knowledge you gain and the stronger thinking skills you develop.
chinese: 你閱讀的範圍越廣，你學到的知識越多，同時你培養的思維能力越強。

english: Research shows that people who read a lot have a greater ability to relate to other people's fellings and beliefs.
chinese: 研究顯示，大量閱讀的人更能夠理解他人的感受與想法。

english: Reading expands your horizons because there are various subject you can choose from.
chinese: 閱讀擴展你的視野，因為有各種可以選擇的主題。
